item.title: On Drupal Entities, or how Organic Groups and Taxonomy are the same thing
item.description: {% raw %} I'm a big fan of the new Entities model for Drupal. I've been working a lot with it lately, and it makes a lot of sense... but my favorite part is how it keeps blowing away my old assumptions, inherited from 7 years of Drupal experience. Here's a big one that got me recently: Organic Groups is useless, because it's basically Taxonomy with a couple of neat add-ons.
